Topic.Title: Combat for users of the web editor

Posts.EditableText:
I have written a tutorial for handling combat if you are using the web editor.

https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/The-Zombie-Apocalypse-(web-version)

It is written for a zombie apocalypse game and uses a function to spawn zombies (games with lots of monsters of the same type are going to be rather easier to do). Also features both melee weapons and firearms (with ammo).

I would be grateful if someone could go through it and confirm it all works (I was changing stuff as I developed the system, and hopefully went back and changed the tutorial as I went along, but may have missed something).

It may be useful for users of the desktop editor, but you would be better off using types and verbs (as well as the Attributes tab of course), or even better [a library](https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/CombatLib)...
